items.title: SoFi launches SoFi Crypto, saying it is the first nationally chartered bank in the US to offer crypto trading to consumers, rolling out in phases (James Hunt/The Block)
items.summary:
James Hunt / The Block:
SoFi launches SoFi Crypto, saying it is the first nationally chartered bank in the US to offer crypto trading to consumers, rolling out in phases  —  - SoFi has launched SoFi Crypto to offer crypto trading for consumers, the first directly integrated crypto offering under its national bank charter.

items.title: This rugged and affordable digital watch taps into G-SHOCK vibes for $15.50
items.summary:
L LAVAREDO Rugged Digital Watch

Buy for $15.50 (Reg. $17)

What we love

If you are drawn to the look of more rugged watches, have a look at this affordable model. While it’s unlikely to compete with the durablity of something like G-SHOCK, it offers a similar vibe for a fraction of the price.

China says the December 2020 theft of 127,272 bitcoin, now worth ~$13B, from Chinese mining pool LuBian is likely a “state-level hacker operation” led by the US  —  China's cybersecurity agency accused the American government of orchestrating the theft about $13 billion worth of Bitcoin …

items.title: Value-packed offer delivers four 23-gallon moving bags with 50-pound capacity for just $3 each (Save 60%)
items.summary:
ClearSpace 23-Gallon Moving Bags (4-pack)

Buy for $12 (Reg. $30)

What we love

While these may be called moving bags, you can use them for that or really whatever you want. They could come in handy once the holidays are over and you need a place to stow all of your decorations, for instance. Either way, at $3 a bag, this is certainly a bargain.

items.title: Come tune in to today’s 40-minute PS5 State of Play showcase
items.summary:
As we reported yesterday, Sony is set to host the next State of Play livestream later this afternoon and you can tune in down below along with us. This time around, we are heading across the pond for Singles’ Day 2025 to showcase 40 straight minutes of titles “created in Japan and across Asia.”

Amazon is offering the JBL Charge 6 Portable Bluetooth Speaker for $129.95 shipped across all its colorways. Normally fetching $200 at full price, you can grab one with a 35% markdown, which slashes $70 from the tag for the best new price we have tracked at Amazon.

items.title: Sprinkle ESR’s Qi2 MagSafe chargers around the house for $12.50 each (26% off)

ESR HaloLock Qi2 USB-C MagSafe Charger

Buy for $12.50 (Reg. $17)

What we love

While Qi2.2 is readily available now with 25W charging speeds, Qi2’s 15W performance continues to be enough for me. If you feel the same, here’s an affordable opportunity to sprinkle some MagSafe chargers around your home, office, and more.

items.title: Pass window cleaning responsibilities to ECOVACS’ Winbot W2 Pro robot while at a new $280 low (Reg. $400+)
items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the ECOVACS Winbot W2 Pro Window Cleaning Robot at $279.99 shipped. It may carry a full $500 MSRP directly from the brand, but at Amazon you’ll often find it rising to $400 at most these days, with the best discounts we’ve spotted over its history having gone as low as a one-time $285 rate that we saw during last month’s Prime Day event, while otherwise dropping costs to $300. Today’s deal is dropping in time for folks to treat themselves for Singles’ Day, giving you a $120 cut from the going rate to a new all-time low price.

items.title: AI chatbots are helping hide eating disorders and making deepfake ‘thinspiration’
